summary: Makes the mod feminine females compatible with requiem.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b] [size=3][i]Updated version for Requiem 1.8.1 available[/i][/size]

Description[/b][/u]
Now every female (also orcs) will actually use the female animations that [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36286/]Feminine females[/url] offers. And still have the changes requiem made. Keep in mind that you should be able to install this mid-game. [b]But[color=#ff0000] some npc's won't change their animation once they are already spawned[/color][/b]. I tried to fix this, but it's beyond my skills, if it's even possible. So if you want your lydia walk like a woman, then you have to start a new game.

[u][b] Installation[/b][/u]
Use NMM

Or drop the esp files manually in your data folder. (...\steamapps\common\skyrim\data)
Always pick the main patch, and then you have the option to also install a patch for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15411/?]ApachiiSkyHair NPC Overhaul[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273/?]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/url] OR both. Choose only 1 optional file (or none if you don't have any of these mods)

[u][b] Requirement[/b][/u]
Skyrim, Dawnguard, Heartfire, Dragonborn
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/]Requiem[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36286/]Feminine females[/url]
Optional: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273/?]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/url]

[i]note: Thanks to [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/5043967-mrfilipenko/]MrFilipenko[/url], for giving permission to merge his patch in the additional file. So now every elf from the Ethereal elven overhaul is compatible with requiem.[/i]
[i]There is also an option for using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15411/?]ApachiiSkyHair NPC Overhaul[/url][/i]. You only need the main [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/]ApachiSkyhair[/url]

[color=#ff0000]You don't need the patches you can get from the original Feminine females, but you always need the main file. So if you really like it how your females are walking like real women, then endorse that mod.[/color]

[u][b] Load order[/b][/u]
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Dawnguard.esm
Heartfires.esm
Dragonborn.esm
[color=#b6b6b6]ApachiiHair.esm (optional)[/color]

Requiem.esp

[color=#999999][color=#b6b6b6]ethereal_elven_overhaul.esp (optional)[/color][/color]

Feminine females.esp
Feminine females - Requiem patch.esp
[color=#b6b6b6]ApachiiHair FF Patch.esp / Ethereal Elven Overhaul FF Patch.esp / ApachiiHair and EEO FF Patch.esp  (optional: only 1 of these)[/color]

[u][b] credits[/b][/u]
All the credits goto bethesda and everyone else who helped for making the game.
And the makers of Requiem and feminine females.
Also the the authors of Apachiiskyhair, and it's npc overhaul. And those that made the ethereal elven overhaul.

[u][b]Final word[/b][/u]
If you have any problems with the installer, or think something else needs to be fixed. Pls tell me. I'm not looking for any endorsements (give those to the original modders if you do like it) But I'm more interested to know if I 'programmed' the installer correctly.
author: Zrynoth

files.name: Feminine female - Requiem patch
files.changelogHtml: Changed from an 'all in one' installer, to seperate files (you only need to download a max of 2 files) I will change it back after I got some time to fix the problem.
